cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 21st Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 21st Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Queen bed with all bedding/towels provided. Full access to kitchen and lounge, Share bathroom close to room. Tea/coffee making facilities in room

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard 4 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Family Rooms on top floor of hostel to ensure privacy. Room has Queen bed and set of bunks. Bathroom with shower and toilet. Full access to kitchen and lounge. All bedding/towels provided. Tea/coffee making facility and small fidge in room

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
